Electricity from fossil fuels - TWh.descriptionShort: Electricity generation from coal, oil, and gas, measured in [terawatt-hours](#dod:watt-hours).
Electricity from fossil fuels - TWh.descriptionProcessing: - While the Energy Institute (EI) provides a longer time series (dating back to 1965) than Ember (dating back only to 1990 for European countries and 2000 for other countries), EI does not cover all countries or all sources of electricity (for example, generation from bioenergy is missing). Therefore, when data from Ember is available for a given country and year, we use it as the primary data source. Where Ember data is unavailable, we supplement it with data from EI.
